classes.lab1.console_calculator.console_reader package¶

Submodules¶

classes.lab1.console_calculator.console_reader.data_from_console module¶

data_from_console Module

This module provides functions for getting parameters and an operator from the console.

classes.lab1.console_calculator.console_reader.data_from_console.get_operator_from_console()[source]¶

Get an operator from the console.

Returns:

The operator entered by the user.

Return type:

str

classes.lab1.console_calculator.console_reader.data_from_console.get_parameters_from_console()[source]¶

Get two float numbers from the console.

Returns:

A tuple containing the two float numbers entered by the user.

Return type:

tuple
